title: Cracking Open the Door for Evenepoel? Red Bull Eyes Rider Market for Next Tour de France Winner
content:
Red Bull-Bora-Hansgrohe is looking for its next Tour de France challenger as it plants seeds for future: 'If there is a top rider maybe we can sign them.'

Read the full article at Cracking Open the Door for Evenepoel? Red Bull Eyes Rider Market for Next Tour de France Winner on Velo.
author: ahood
